name: Tea
desc: A soothing and aromatic infusion, perfect for a moment of relaxation or a morning pick-me-up.

name: Latte
desc: Smooth espresso combined with steamed milk, creating a creamy and comforting beverage.

name: Iced Coffee
desc: Refreshing and energizing, a chilled concoction of coffee over ice, ideal for warmer days.

name: Avocado Toast
desc: A trendy and nutritious dish featuring creamy avocado spread atop toasted bread, often garnished with various toppings like tomatoes, feta cheese, or poached eggs.

name: Sandwich
desc: A classic meal option, consisting of layers of ingredients such as deli meats, cheeses, vegetables, and spreads, nestled between slices of bread.

name: Egg Toast
desc: A simple yet satisfying dish showcasing perfectly cooked eggs atop toasted bread, versatile enough to be enjoyed for breakfast, brunch, or even a quick snack.

name: Pancake
desc: Fluffy, golden-brown delights served with a variety of toppings such as syrup, berries, or whipped cream, making for a delightful breakfast or indulgent treat.

name: Vegan Yogurt
desc: Creamy and dairy-free, made from plant-based ingredients like soy, almond, or coconut milk, offering a guilt-free alternative to traditional yogurt.

name: Chocolate Cheesecake
desc: Decadent and indulgent, a rich dessert featuring a velvety-smooth blend of chocolate and cream cheese atop a buttery biscuit crust, sure to satisfy any sweet tooth craving.
